alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 23 at 6:20AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN GREELEY...VALLEY AND NORTHERN SHERMAN COUNTIES THROUGH 700 AM CDT... At 619 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Comstock to Loup City. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ord, Elyria, and Fort Hartsuff State Park around 635 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
